## Store.bindingAsRx() method

An api to allow the observation of values and arbitrary bindings as Rx observables.

**Signature:**

```typescript
bindingAsRx(): RXObservable<this>;
```
**Returns:**

RXObservable&lt;this&gt;

An rxjs Observable of the entire store.

## Example


```ts
const entireStore$ = this.store.bindingAsRx().subscribe(value => {...});
```
